experience.description: Worked on developing and optimizing web applications with a focus on performance and scalability. Contributed to building features, debugging issues, and collaborating with the product team to deliver efficient solutions.
Developed various personal projects to enhance my skills in web and app development along with AI/ML. These projects include a portfolio website, a task management app, and a blog platform.

education.field: Electronics and Communication Engineering (ECE) with Minors in AI/ML
education.institution: Gokaraju Rangaraju Institute of Engineering and Technology (GRIET)
education.description: Studied core Electronics and Communication Engineering along with a Minor in Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning. Key areas include Data Structures & Algorithms, Web Development, and Applied AI/ML.
